episode.title: It Shouldn’t Be Hard to Get a Smoothie
episode.rawTitle: 288: ‘It Shouldn’t Be Hard to Get a Smoothie’ With Dan Frommer
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Dan Frommer returns to the show for more analysis of WWDC 2020, including App Clips and the Mac's transition to Apple silicon.
